summary: I love how in the matrix, when Neo meets the spoon kid, he absolutely takes him seriously and learns from him. There's no...
body: I love how in the matrix, when Neo meets the spoon kid, he absolutely takes him seriously and learns from him. There’s no hesitation to trust this kid once he sees him bend the spoon, he just takes his advice silently and thanks him. It’s so different from most portrayals of kids–rather than either having the adult not trust the kid or having the kid be super pushy about their intelligence, Neo sees that he has reason to trust the kid and he does. It’s so beautifully simple.

reblog.comment: I love how in the matrix, when Neo meets the spoon kid, he absolutely takes him seriously and learns from him. There’s no hesitation to trust this kid once he sees him bend the spoon, he just takes his advice silently and thanks him. It’s so different from most portrayals of kids–rather than either having the adult not trust the kid or having the kid be super pushy about their intelligence, Neo sees that he has reason to trust the kid and he does. It’s so beautifully simple.
trail.content: I love how in the matrix, when Neo meets the spoon kid, he absolutely takes him seriously and learns from him. There’s no hesitation to trust this kid once he sees him bend the spoon, he just takes his advice silently and thanks him. It’s so different from most portrayals of kids–rather than either having the adult not trust the kid or having the kid be super pushy about their intelligence, Neo sees that he has reason to trust the kid and he does. It’s so beautifully simple.

blog.name: angelofberlin2000
blog.title: Like a Rose trampled on the ground
blog.description:
In addition to the pain and the exhaustion, he recalled how waiting on the cross between takes became tedious. To fight the boredom, he listened to music on headphones. One particular song called "Above All" (Like a Rose ...) by Michael W. Smith helped him through his most difficult moments.

"It arrived when I was confused and angry. I didn't think I could go on. The song described how Jesus was rejected and alone. That thought took me to a place — it opened an interior door that held me while on the cross," an emotional Caviezel explained. "The experience of feeling rejected and alone as all those around me laughed while drinking their hot coffees, oblivious to what was occurring. Jesus must have felt like this — forsaken, rejected, alone, and despised. It helped me pray in a very deep way — to pray without words, to pray from the heart. The discomfort, the loneliness, the split shoulder, the raw flesh all forced me into the arms of God because I had nowhere else to go for a performance I knew I was unable to create."
Jim Caviezel, Shamelessly Catholic

question: John Constantine and Angela Dodson.
answer:
Disaster Exorcist Man & Exasperated Detective? Here we go:

Who cooks normally?

Bold of you to assume John Constantine knows how to cook.

How often do they fight?

They bicker a lot. The thing is, neither of them is willing to cave in and admit the other is right (it’s normally Angela. Almost always.)

What do they do when they’re away from each other?

Angela solves cases and is generally a competent professional. John collects possible “occult artefacts” (which sometimes end up just being worthless objects or odd-looking rocks) and hangs around with the neighbourhood cats.

Nicknames for each other?

I really like the idea of his nickname being “Connie”. She’s Ange. Or ‘Officer Dodson’ when he’s feeling sassy (often).

Who is more likely to pay for dinner?

Angela, because John is broke.

Who steals the covers at night?

John does. You know that irrational fear that if you leave any part of your body outside of the covers, a demon will come and get you in the night? He has that.

What would they get each other for gifts?

Angela gets John an angry-looking rubber duck, as company for his Bathtime Trips to Hell. John gets her books on the occult, to encourage her to learn more about those mysterious psychic powers of hers.

Who remembers things?

John can remember all kinds of information about demons and mythology, but is hopeless at remembering simple things like taking out the trash. I feel like this would definitely be Angela.

Who cusses more?

John Fucking Constantine.

What would they do if the other one was hurt?

Angela would tell John he really needs to start taking better care of himself, and sort of berate him for it, but would still help him out until he’s feeling better. John, on the other hand, would try all kinds of weird healing rituals and herbal remedies to get her back to health. In the end, she’s wearing like five amulets and she can’t get the smell of sage out of her hair.

Who kissed who first?

John kissed her first - totally on an impulse, because he was pretty sure he was about to die in the near future.

Who made the first move?

Angela - John’s hopeless at confessing his affection.

Who started the relationship?

John - he’s not used to people being so nice to him, so he gets attached to Angela like a stray cat gets attached to the person who feeds them. She just finds the Total Disaster Man weirdly charming, in his way.

blog.name: angelofberlin2000
blog.title: Like a Rose trampled on the ground
blog.description:
In addition to the pain and the exhaustion, he recalled how waiting on the cross between takes became tedious. To fight the boredom, he listened to music on headphones. One particular song called "Above All" (Like a Rose ...) by Michael W. Smith helped him through his most difficult moments.

"It arrived when I was confused and angry. I didn't think I could go on. The song described how Jesus was rejected and alone. That thought took me to a place — it opened an interior door that held me while on the cross," an emotional Caviezel explained. "The experience of feeling rejected and alone as all those around me laughed while drinking their hot coffees, oblivious to what was occurring. Jesus must have felt like this — forsaken, rejected, alone, and despised. It helped me pray in a very deep way — to pray without words, to pray from the heart. The discomfort, the loneliness, the split shoulder, the raw flesh all forced me into the arms of God because I had nowhere else to go for a performance I knew I was unable to create."
Jim Caviezel, Shamelessly Catholic

tags: can we just protect him and his fans
summary: Yall i went to the Keanu Reeves fandom and holy shit is it so beautiful and precious. Like everyone posts about their love and...
body: Yall i went to the Keanu Reeves fandom and holy shit is it so beautiful and precious. Like everyone posts about their love and respect for him as an actor and human being, they out here posting photo shoots that he’s had. Talking bout why they love his films(especially John Wick) and they’re also talking bout how much they wanna marry him but know its a no no. Can we just like…protect them at all costs?!
